title: 158. The Turtleneck Episode
description:
It’s the turtleneck episode! Today Chris talks about how much he hated the Sabra Super Bowl commercial, the greatest acting performance of all time (it’s Nicolas Cage in Bad Lieutenant), Machine Gun Kelly, and Patrick Mahomes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
